title: Increase Your Amazon KDP Sales by Building A Brand Like This....
description:

In today's video I take a look at my latest book that I am publishing onto Amazon KDP and how I plan to build a bigger brand around this book. It is time to start dreaming bigger and seeing what we can really achieve through publishing online. I will go over the steps I am taking, look at some sales results, talk about branding, tiktok, etsy and email marketing. There is a lot in this video. I will also take a look at the new Time Wor
